translations: 特殊化；[经]专门化（specialization 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Boost defines only select partial specializations of these templates.
sentences.translation: Boost只定义了这些模板的选定局部特殊化。

sentences.sentence: Keep reading to see if one of these MBA specializations is right for you.
sentences.translation: 继续往下看，看其中一个MBA专业是否适合你。

sentences.sentence: Extend DITA map specializations to include course-level and unit-level mapping.
sentences.translation: 扩展DITA映射特化以包括课程级和单元级的映射。
